; <本周中美两国最高领导人会晤取得成功，将为两国的未来发展定下积极的基调和议程。

;

; 接受《中国日报》采访的观察人士对中美领导人会晤和亚太经合组织经济合作峰会期间习近平主席与美国总统拜登的一对一会晤表示期待领导者在旧金山举行的会议。

;

; 世界粮食奖基金会名誉主席、美国前外交官员肯尼思·奎恩 (Kenneth Quinn) 表示，“我认为举行拜登与习主席峰会极为紧迫”奎因表示，国家元首级别的双边会晤可以加强和稳定两国关系，这一点最近才表明有迹象表明，美国总统选举周期已从数十年来的最低水平中显现出来。

;

;通常以攻击中国的言论为特色——奎因补充道，从一月开始，华盛顿可能不会再有机会采取任何重大甚至小步骤。

;

; 这次面对面会议将是两个最大经济体领导人之间的首次会面自从一年前他们在印度尼西亚巴厘岛会面以来。

;

; 随着接下来几个月关系的紧张，北京敦促华盛顿采取行动落实习近平和拜登达成的重要共识。

; <耶鲁大学蔡英文中国中心高级研究员史蒂芬·罗奇 (Stephen Roach) 10 月 26 日撰文称，另一次习近平与拜登的峰会可能是“迫切需要”的一次峰会。第二次机会，而且必须“为成功做好准备”。

;

; “确实感觉两位总统为旧金山之行所做的准备比巴厘岛之行准备得更好，”他说。罗奇说道。 “然而，虽然准备工作是必要的，但这还不足以让峰会取得成功。”他指的是近几个月来双边高层交往的增加。

;

; 参议院多数党领袖查克·舒默上个月率领美国参议院两党代表团访问中国，这是美国议员自 2019 年以来首次访问中国。

;

; 习近平告诉舒默，竞争和对抗不符合时代潮流，更不能解决世界面临的问题和挑战。

;

; 舒默之前自 6 月以来，四位拜登政府高级官员已访问中国：国务卿安东尼·布林肯、财政部长珍妮特·耶伦、总统气候特使约翰·克里和商务部长吉娜·雷蒙多。

;

; 概述华盛顿的访问在谈到美中关系的方针时，耶伦表示，美国寻求与中国合作应对从气候变化到债务困扰等全球挑战。它并不寻求与中国脱钩，而是为中国“去风险化”。以避免在国家安全等领域妥协。

;

; 耶伦7月份访华，中美经济工作组第一次会议于上月底举行。

;

; p>;

; “我们知道美中关系是世界上最重要的关系之一。我们需要把事情做好，”耶伦本月初表示。

;

; 罗奇表示，为了使峰会取得成功，重点应该减少口号——例如去年的“地板”在关系之下，或者说今年的“去风险化” —以及更多关于明确且可实现的目标，例如重新开放已关闭的领事馆和加强民间交流。

;

;那么中美有必要强调对两国面临的两种威胁的共同认识;气候变化和全球健康——罗奇补充道，制定一个制度化的参与模式，为持续排除故障和解决问题提供一个永久、强大的框架。

;

; ;积极的语气;

;

; 加里华盛顿智库彼得森国际经济研究所高级研究员赫夫鲍尔表示，旧金山会议应该为两国关系定下积极基调。

;

; 峰会的紧迫性部分源于俄罗斯- 乌克兰和以色列-巴勒斯坦冲突，他说，并补充道，“任何一个都可能引发一场更大规模的战争，而中国和美国都不想这样。”

;

; 其他专家对结果表示谨慎乐观会议列出了“最低限度”

;

; 华盛顿战略与国际研究中心中国商业和经济高级顾问兼受托人主席斯科特·肯尼迪将中美关系的现状描述为“脆弱的稳定”。< /p>;

; 虽然两国不太可能回到以合作为主的蜜月期，但他表示，两国有可能实现稳定的“不冲突的竞争”。

;

; “这需要双方认识到，必须避免发生彻底的冲突，并采取措施使冲突变得更加困难，并且在许多领域合作仍然非常有价值，”他说。肯尼迪说。

;

; 他希望“至少”采取措施使人与人之间的联系重新正常化，包括增加直飞航班、简化旅行者签证程序、为记者提供更多签证以及中国驻德克萨斯州休斯敦总领事馆和美国驻四川省成都总领事馆将重新开放。两个领事馆均于 2020 年关闭。

;

; ;及时的一步;

;

;对于美国前贸易代表、世界银行前行长罗伯特·佐利克来说，拜登-习近平峰会将是“良好而及时的一步”两国关系在过去一年中急剧下滑。

;

; “两国都应该避免误判或可能升级的事故风险。”因此我希望两军能够恢复对话，特别是危机沟通。”他说。

;

; 佐利克的 2020 年著作《世界中的美国：美国外交和外交政策史》指出了美国外交中出现的传统。 ”中国更喜欢制定原则来指导个别问题的行动，而美国则倾向于从解决实际问题开始，它也认为这是建立信任的一种方式。

;

; “也许这次会议可能会寻求原则和行动的结合。至少，两位领导人可以密切倾听彼此的观点、利益和制约因素。”他说。

;

; 中国和美国还可能探讨与多边金融机构，特别是国际货币基金组织和世界银行的合作议程，两国可以与其他国家合作，帮助最贫穷的国家发展并成为世界上最贫穷的国家。佐利克表示，“一些发展中国家将需要债务重组甚至减免方面的帮助。”亚投行（亚洲基础设施投资银行）可以与世界银行、亚洲开发银行在基础设施领域开展合作。”他补充道。

;

; 佐利克表示，他预计领导人还将讨论将于本月底在迪拜举行的 COP28 气候峰会，其中美中合作“必须成为基石”。

;

; 美国气候特使克里和中国气候变化特使解振华本月在加利福尼亚州的阳光之乡沙漠度假村举行会谈，这里也是习近平 6 月首次美国峰会的举办地2013年。

;

;在那次峰会上，习近平和时任美国总统巴拉克·奥巴马同意建立一种避免“修昔底德陷阱”的关系。 —崛起大国与守成大国之间的冲突。

;

; 在10月9日与舒默的讨论中，习近平重新审视了这一主题，表示修昔底德陷阱并非不可避免，地球足够广阔，足以容纳各自的国家。中美共同发展和共同繁荣。

;

;对修昔底德陷阱的看法体现了国家对中美关系政策的一贯性。

; 最新数据北京国家气候中心表示，温和的厄尔尼诺现象预计将持续到明年春季，并可能导致2023年超过2016年，成为1850年以来最热的一年。

;

; 据世界气象组织称，厄尔尼诺现象是一种自然发生的气候现象，始于赤道中东部太平洋异常温暖的表层海水，进而影响全球天气。平均每2至7年发生一次，一次通常持续9至12个月。

;

; 该中心表示，厄尔尼诺现象与全球变暖的结合将增加极端天气引发气象灾害的机会。 。它还可能导致严冬。

;

; 预计厄尔尼诺事件将导致今年 11 月至 2024 年 1 月期间海面温度达到峰值。自 5 月以来，厄尔尼诺系统一直在沿着东太平洋赤道。

;

; 厄尔尼诺现象使热带太平洋的大气升温，导致全球气温上升。研究表明，赤道东太平洋气温每升高1℃，全球年平均气温就会升高0.12℃。

;

; 中度或强烈的厄尔尼诺事件通常会使全球平均地表升高该中心补充说，气温升高约0.1℃至0.22℃。

;

;在谈到对中国的影响时，该中心表示，厄尔尼诺现象往往会给南方地区带来更多降雨，并引发中国气温升高。

;

; 自20世纪90年代以来，每次厄尔尼诺现象发生后，中国都会出现连续两个夏季降雨量高于正常水平的现象。同期降雨偏多的地区也从江南地区向北扩展至淮河流域。天气现象的影响还导致夏季和冬季更加严酷。

;

; 该中心副主任贾小龙在11月初的新闻发布会上表示，统计数据显示，在厄尔尼诺事件背景下，冬季气温波动较大，影响我国的寒潮次数往往比平时多。

;

; “人们应密切关注低温、降雨等天气现象可能带来的不利影响。”还有雪，”他说。

;

; 中心近日发布了今冬明春气候趋势预测。预计北方地区和青藏高原可能面临雪灾，供暖需求较以往增加，导致能源消费出现暂时高峰。

;会员在上海静安嘉里中心的 Pure 瑜伽馆参加普拉提课程十月。

; ;

;Lululemon 的亚太地区最大的专卖店位于上海静安嘉里中心。

;

; 爬上上海静安嘉里中心的弧形楼梯，Lululemon 的店铺就在眼前。

;

; 这是 Pure Group 和 Lululemon 近期联合开发的一项创新成果，为小型团体提供健身服务。课程包括太极瑜伽、普拉提、吊环以及20多种自主研发的瑜伽和健身课程。

;

; 在由两间教室组成的400平方米的新场地，消费者可以预约课程网上购物，到达后通过手机扫码自动登录。

;

; 门口已准备好干净的毛巾和训练服供领取。

;

; 店内以大地色装饰。泥红、绿的色调，流动的线条、圆角和曲线营造出活泼流畅的氛围。接待处的迷你吧内设有旗下食品饮料品牌Nood Food，为会员提供多样化的食用和饮用产品。

;

; 在会场开幕式上，Pure董事总经理Jane Jiang China表示，“该店重新定义了高级运动场景和优质运动社区——”寻求中国健身市场扩张和发展的门户—— “通过与Lululemon合作，创造更好的培训体验，为更多人带来福祉。”

;

; 这个小型工作室是在Pure集团在中国大陆运营十周年之际揭幕的，Pure Group瑜伽和健身工作室遍布香港、北京、上海、新加坡和纽约等市场。

;

; “事实证明，我们的存在对于注重体验和便捷支付方式的高端健身工作室具有巨大潜力， ”蒋说，近期全国健身行业的起伏，导致不少健身房、瑜伽连锁店关门，消费者信心受到打击。

;

; 目前，国内健身运动的最大推动力体育产业是女性参与体育运动的新兴方式——瑜伽、城市漫步、飞盘和露营—— Key-solution Sports Consulting创始人Adam Zhang说道。 “她运动”的兴起这种现象推动了全国健身中心、体育设施制造和运动服装产品的发展。

;

; 张说，尤其是瑜伽行业将继续增长，并补充说，“女性正在大力投资” ”

;

; 根据艾瑞咨询的数据，2020 年中国瑜伽市场已达到 387 亿元人民币（53 亿美元），预计到今年年底将达到 561 亿元人民币。 2021年，瑜伽服装本身在中国的价值为16亿美元，占全球份额的23%。 QY Research 表示，到 2028 年，该行业预计将攀升至 30 亿美元以上。

;

; 国内体育巨头安踏上个月收购了上海女性运动服装生产商 Maia Active 75.13% 的股份，以追求该国新兴的女性运动服市场。安踏表示，Maia Active 的业务在女性消费者中尤其是瑜伽运动品类具有一定的市场影响力，未来具有增长潜力。

;

; 对于全球领先的运动服饰公司 Lululemon Athletica Inc 来说，其旗下该公司表示，第二季度在中国的收入同比增长61%，达到2.77亿美元，是去年同期30%增长率的两倍，这主要得益于门店扩张和消费者需求增长。上半年，Lululemon 在全球新开的 17 家门店中，有 9 家在中国。

;

; 今年 Pure 会员数量的增长似乎很自然，超过了 2021 年的峰值，这要归功于该公司表示，部分原因是工作时间更加灵活，以及人们对福祉和健康的意识不断增强。

;

; 其大多数会员都是高净值人士，包括企业决策者和高层人士。高管，以及25岁至35岁之间精通潮流的消费者。

;

;“年轻消费者加入我们的行列是为了提高运动水平和社交场合，这鼓励我们更多地与时尚品牌接触，”江说。 “纯粹已经成为年轻一代展示生活方式的时尚个人标签。”

;

; 会员的;由于公司扩大了教程、课程和物理空间，今年到目前为止，Pure 的活跃参与率比去年同期增长了 30%。

;

; 例如，一些工作室的阳台蒋说，为了满足会员在露天场所表演的需求，Pure的业务分为一半是瑜伽，一半是健身训练。在上海。 Pure在北京的两家工作室目前只提供瑜伽服务。公司今年增加了更多针对特定运动项目的训练。

;

; 随着越来越多的人开始户外徒步、骑行、骑行、露营和登山，公司设计了交叉训练课程，为会员赋能。# 39；能够参加更活跃的户外运动。

;

; 具有治愈和治愈功能的课程也很受欢迎——无论是身体上还是精神上——自今年年初以来。

;

; 在 Pure，近 40% 的课程都有治疗成分。

;

; “治疗和治疗课程的预订量往往是普通课程的两到三倍。我们的实际能力，”蒋说。 “我们正在逐步扩大此类课程的比例。”

;

; 她说，财务健康且可持续的支付系统是健身中心生存的关键，并有助于增强会员的信心。

;

; Pure 要求每月付款，而不是长期预付卡，根据个人会员条款和条件，其价格比去年提高了 10% 至 25%。

;

; 蒋表示，涨价部分原因是为了增加附加值档次以及设施和产品的改造投入。

;

; 回到新的门店业态，短期内公司不打算开大店。江说。

;

; “我们正在探索更多的形式、特色和亮点以及各种规模的选择。”

;

; 新工作室可能是合作的她说，与其他行业合作推出不同类型的健身房，大概有1000到2000平方米。

;

; 在健康、健身和运动服饰行业蓬勃发展的生态的赋能下，Pure有更多的社会责任来提供总经理表示，会员有归属感和安全感。

;

; 安全和效率是 Pure 会员最追求的，这激发了一种新的业务类别——安全和效率。私人健康教练。

;

; 针对中国老龄化社会，终身无伤健身之旅已被列入 Pure 的议程，或者说是通常所说的“生活方式医学”。 —使用生活方式干预作为治疗慢性病的主要方法。解决方案涵盖个人饮食、健身、压力管理和睡眠，并具有云端实时监控。例如，在健康教练的支持下进行体重管理，江说，应该是温和、有效和可持续的，而不是简单依靠饮食的短期方法。

;

; Key-solution的张称赞Pure＆ #39；班级规模和商店形式的最新创新。 “就像五星级酒店一样，可以为优质客户提供良好的体验。但对他们来说，尝试具有特殊亮点的小众酒店体验会更有趣。”他说。

;

; 周五闭幕的第六届中国国际进口博览会吸引了众多中外各行业企业前来寻求合作机会。这一年度盛会提供了一个重要的平台，展示创新产品、技术专长和服务解决方案，建立有价值的合作伙伴关系并增强商业参与者的实力。与会跨国公司高管表示，立足中国市场。他们中的一些人分享了他们对年度活动在其业务中的作用的看法。市场观察人士表示，随着中国经济从疫情中复苏，中国庞大的市场和深度整合的供应链网络继续吸引国际企业汇丰银行中国行长兼首席执行官王马克表示：“随着中国新经济发展和低碳转型的不断推进，中国将在第六届中国国际进口博览会上周五闭幕。”汇丰银行在第六届进博会期间发布的《连接中国》报告显示，中国经济的回升带动了87%的受访跨国企业

;

; 汇丰银行连续第六年参加进博会，创下了年度参展展位面积最大、附属机构数量最多的纪录。< /p>;

; 该公司在汇丰展位上展示了其国际互联互通的标志性能力，特别关注智能供应链、可持续发展、数字创新和财富管理。

;

; 此外，汇丰银行&#王总表示，39;全新推出的英国创新银行计划在创新孵化专区展示，展示了公司支持创新业务的能力。

;

; 汇丰海外及中国高层领导并与业界专家就全球贸易、新经济、数字创新、可持续金融、财富管理以及粤港澳大湾区带来的机遇等多项活动分享观点和见解。

; < p>; “我们预计，中国消费市场的复苏及其规模所带来的增长潜力将继续吸引海外参展商在进博会上推出新产品并投资该市场。”

;

;他表示，汇丰早在今年7月就牵头签署了第七届进博会参展合同，体现了汇丰对中国发展前景的坚定信心。

;

; >;

; “我们将继续帮助更多的国际企业和投资者从中国市场的增长中受益，让更多的中国企业抓住全球经济带来的巨大机遇。”

;

; 汇丰银行和汇丰欧洲首席执行官 Colin Bell 表示，进博会等国际活动对于在 COVID-19 大流行之后重新连接东西方来说非常重要。

;

; 他表示，进博会提供了了解未来技术、创新和产业的机会，并与其他商界领袖建立联系，讨论他们看到的中欧贸易和投资的未来机遇。

; < p>; 贝尔表示，中国经济依然充满活力，为境内外投资提供了令人兴奋的机会。

;

; “尽管存在短期挑战，但中国市场对欧洲企业仍然具有吸引力，因为他们继续利用杠杆来寻求扩张。数字经济和绿色产业的机遇”他补充道。

; Wed, 15 Nov 2023 06:52:04 +0800 016CHINA INTERNATIONAL IMPORT EXPO - Company embraces collaboration at top show in Shanghaihttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-11/15/content_016_6553e559ed50d203d2ca291e.htm#016CHINA INTERNATIONAL IMPORT EXPO

;首席执行官 Matthew Bouw戴德梁行韦克菲尔德亚太地区

; ;

;高纬环球韦克菲尔德的服务和解决方案在博览会上展出。

;

; 高纬环球 (Cushman & Co.)韦克菲尔德通过11月5日至10日在上海举办的第六届中国国际进口博览会，加强了与商业伙伴的合作。

;

; 这家国际房地产服务提供商与地方政府和地方政府签署了40多项合作协议。今年的博览会期间，包括广东省建筑设计研究院在内的全国行业领军企业将齐聚一堂。研究院和江苏省吴江经济技术开发区管委会。

;

; “通过这些合作，我们希望推动中国商业地产的可持续发展和创新，”高纬环球首席执行官 Matthew Bouw 表示。韦克菲尔德亚太区。

;

; 这是该公司第二次参加进博会。它还推出了“We are Living Change Now”活动。今年的活动与 Cushman & 合作。韦克菲尔德万科服务，包括发布两份报告和一系列小组讨论，涵盖低碳发展、国际消费城市和中国房地产投资信托基金（C-REITs）等主题。

;

;博览会是一个与重要客户和合作伙伴接触和合作的绝佳平台，有助于推动房地产行业的可​​持续发展。” Bouw 说道。

;

; “这极大地帮助我们展示了我们的市场领先地位，并进一步提高了我们的品牌知名度。”他补充道。

;

; 今年是高纬环球进入中国30周年。 Bouw表示，他们非常自豪能够跟上中国商业房地产市场巨大变革的步伐，而且能够保持行业领先地位，通过他们的服务不断发展，迎接这个极其活跃的市场的挑战和机遇

;

; 据他介绍，该公司认为中国是其在亚太地区乃至全球最重要的市场之一。

;

; “虽然中国目前面临着尽管存在一些不利因素，但该国仍然是世界第二大经济体，第三季度 GDP 同比增长 4.9%，并且没有像许多其他经济体那样面临利率或通胀挑战。”

;

; 与许多其他商业房地产市场一样，中国也存在结构性和周期性挑战，但仍然存在潜在优势：办公回报率位居全球前茅；根据世界银行的数据，家庭存款利率很高； and alternative and new economy asset classes will continue to drive commercial real estate activities across logistics, industrial, warehousing and supply chain sectors.

;

; According to Bouw, both globally and in China, Cushman & Wakefield will continue to invest in those areas which see growth as a result of secular and demographic trends.

;

; "In recent years, we have built up our capability in logistics, industrial and data center real estate in response to booming online activities such as those for shopping, gaming and social contacts," he said.

; Wed, 15 Nov 2023 06:52:04 +0800 016CHINA INTERNATIONAL IMPORT EXPO - Bullish outlook as Dole expands business in countryhttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-11/15/content_016_6553e559ed50d203d2ca291f.htm#016CHINA INTERNATIONAL IMPORT EXPO
;
;;

;Makoto Sawanoi, president of Dole Fresh Produce Group

; ;

;Dole exhibits a diverse range of fruits and vegetables at this year's CIIE.

; ;

;

;

; Dole, one of the world's leading fruit suppliers, has grown with the China International Import Expo during the past five years and remained bullish in the Chinese market.

;

; Dole is an old friend of the CIIE, said Makoto Sawanoi, president of Dole Fresh Produce Group, during the sixth CIIE held from Nov 5-10 in Shanghai. The company has attended the expo for six consecutive sessions.

;

; "We have gained a lot from the expo. It's an effective platform to learn about Chinese consumers and seek cooperation with partners in China and other countries," Sawanoi said.

;

; During the past five sessions, Dole had obtained orders worth more than 100 million yuan ($13.72 million) and established partnerships with numerous Chinese enterprises.

;

; This year, Dole expanded its booth area and exhibited a diverse range of fruits and vegetables, including golden Puyat durians from the Philippines, which secured approval to the Chinese market in January. Before that, only fresh durians from Thailand and Vietnam and frozen durians from Malaysia were permitted to the country.

;

; The expo shows the world the huge Chinese market, while in turn promoting the country's opening-up, Sawanoi said.

;

; In the fruit industry, more foreign produce has been allowed into the Chinese market during the past five years, thanks to the CIIE's spillover effect, said Wang Na, marketing director of Dole China.

;

; Wang added that Dole has raised its profile and brand recognition in China through the expo.

;

; "We are very happy to see more people recognize Dole and we hope to provide more Chinese consumers with high-quality nutrition and promote healthy diets," Sawanoi said.

;

; Since 2018, the company has achieved an average annual sales increase of 10 percent in the Chinese market. More than just in the first and second-tier cities and large supermarkets, its presence has reached lower-tier cities and regional stores.

;

; "In the past, Chinese consumers cared more about prices but today they have high demands for high-quality, healthy fruits. That is exactly what we can provide," Sawanoi said.

;

; He emphasized that Dole is staying optimistic about the Chinese market despite the complex global economic situation and plans to expand investment in China. "I believe consumers' needs for quality products will continue to grow," he added.

;

; During the 2023 CIIE, Dole also showcased its new breakthroughs in sustainability, including the technology transforming substandard fruits into bio-leather after cultivation and fermentation with fungal mycelium.

;

; Wed, 15 Nov 2023 06:52:04 +0800 016CHINA INTERNATIONAL IMPORT EXPO - Harvesting contacts to link up worldwide food chain at CIIEhttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-11/15/content_016_6553e559ed50d203d2ca2920.htm#016CHINA INTERNATIONAL IMPORT EXPO
;
;;

;Guan Huili, president of Cargill China

; ;

;Diverse drinks made with Cargill's products are exhibited at the CIIE.

;

; Cargill will continue to invest in China, connecting it with the global food supply chain and supporting green, sustainable agriculture, said Guan Huili, president of Cargill China, during the sixth China International Import Expo.

;

; The food and agricultural giant, based in the United States, has participated in the expo for six consecutive years and sealed deals with Chinese enterprises worth more than $11.1 billion during the previous five sessions.

;

; Focusing on innovation and sustainability, it exhibited diverse products and technologies at its booth this year, ranging from food, and animal nutrition and health to beauty and personal care. Visitors to the booth enjoyed a variety of drinks made by Cargill.

;

; In addition, the company introduced innovative and sustainable solutions at the CIIE, including its Sustainable Ingredient Assessment System and Agriness, a digital management service for the pig industry.

;

; "Cargill has different operations. The CIIE offers us an effective platform to demonstrate who we are and what we are doing in the Chinese market," Guan said.

;

; Guan added that they had joined in promotional events hosted by the CIIE and media outlets during the previous years, which raised public awareness of their brand and products.

;

; "Meanwhile, it is a great place to meet with key stakeholders and learn about industrial trends and consumer preferences, so that we can mobilize our global resources to better serve the Chinese market and promote sustainable agricultural development in China," she said.

;

; Cargill also formed a partnership with the China Development Research Foundation during this year's expo to launch a regenerative agricultural research project together. The yearlong project is designed to foster the green development of Chinese agriculture and support the country's carbon neutrality objectives, according to the company.

;

; Cargill has always been a trusted partner of China to vitalize rural areas and develop sustainable agriculture, Guan said. "We are not only contributing global expertise to the country's food and agriculture industry through investment, but collaborating with the government and other stakeholders to help to promote rural prosperity."

;

; The ANH Livestock Farmers Training Project, initiated by Cargill and the China Agricultural Science and Education Foundation at the 2022 CIIE, concluded in August. The project has provided training courses to more than 1,300 farmers and scholarships to 89 college students, Cargill said.

;

; Since entering the Chinese market in 1971, the company has constantly increased its investment and established some 50 operations across the country.

;

; Guan emphasized that China is a strategic market in Cargill's global business due to its large population, expanding middle class and urbanization, and the increasing demand for food and agricultural products.

;

; "Our growth in China is bolstered by the business-friendly environment created by governments at various levels in China," Guan said.

; Wed, 15 Nov 2023 06:52:04 +0800 016CHINA INTERNATIONAL IMPORT EXPO - Growing appetite for trade as firm marks 50 years' presencehttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-11/15/content_016_6553e559ed50d203d2ca2921.htm#016CHINA INTERNATIONAL IMPORT EXPO

;Michael Gelchie, CEO of Louis Dreyfus Company

; ;

;Louis Dreyfus Company exhibits a variety of agricultural products at the Shanghai expo.

;

; Louis Dreyfus Company, a Europe-based merchant and processor of agricultural goods, has participated in the China International Import Expo for the sixth consecutive time.

;

; Under the theme of "50 years of development in China, sharing, co-creation and win-win", Louis Dreyfus Company used the sixth CIIE as a chance to tap into the consumer market in the country.

;

; The company showcased its new plant-based ingredients and freeze-dried coffee powder, as well as products such as NFC — or not-from concentrate — fruit juice and edible oil. Several cooperation agreements were signed to deepen value chain collaboration, strengthen integration within business chains and provide diverse products that cater to the market and consumers.

;

; Michael Gelchie, CEO of Louis Dreyfus Company, attended this session of the CIIE and participated in the parallel Hongqiao International Economic Forum.

;

; "In 2023, Louis Dreyfus Company is celebrating its 50th anniversary of development in China. We have always had confidence in China's growth and actively sought to deepen cooperation with China," Gelchie said.

;

; "China plays a significant role in the global economy and agricultural trade. With sustained growth and market potential, the market has seen exciting growth. Louis Dreyfus Company is willing to participate in China's development and explore cooperation opportunities," he added.

;

; In accordance with the strong demand of Chinese consumers for healthy plant-based products, Louis Dreyfus Company has established a plant-based ingredients platform this year, focusing on glycerin, phospholipids, specialty feed and vegetable oil businesses.

;

; It has also set up a global research and development center in Shanghai. During this year's CIIE, the company showcased its range of plant-based ingredients, including new specialty feed protein products. These products improve the digestibility and utilization efficiency of feed protein through new fermentation technology, promoting the healthy growth of livestock and poultry.

;

; Additionally, Louis Dreyfus Company exhibited its new freeze-dried coffee powder to meet the rapidly growing Chinese coffee consumption market. Upgraded packaging of their Mastergold brand edible oil and NFC fruit juice products were also showcased at the CIIE.

;

; As a globally renowned enterprise, Louis Dreyfus Company adheres to the concept of sustainable development. At this CIIE, the company offset its carbon footprint from participating in the exhibition with high-quality carbon credits for the first time, launching a Zero Carbon Booth.

;

; During this CIIE, Louis Dreyfus Company has once again signed trade agreements with a large number of Chinese partners engaged in various sectors such as grain and oilseeds, plant-based ingredients, fruit juice and coffee, to promote win-win growth.

;

; "In the future, Louis Dreyfus Company will continue to invest in the Chinese market, find partners with complementary advantages and trustworthiness, and share the dividends of China's continuous opening-up to pursue a bright and win-win future," said Jerrity Chen, head of North Asia Region for Louis Dreyfus Company.

; Wed, 15 Nov 2023 06:52:04 +0800 016CHINA INTERNATIONAL IMPORT EXPO - Event offers new opportunities for Brazilian supplierhttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-11/15/content_016_6553e559ed50d203d2ca2922.htm#016CHINA INTERNATIONAL IMPORT EXPO

;Danilo Escobar Izeli, president of Asia at JBS Seara

; ;

;JBS representatives hold talks with clients at its booth at the sixth CIIE.

;

; JBS, one of the largest protein-based food suppliers in the world, is looking forward to exploring new opportunities with Chinese partners through the China International Import Expo and creating a win-win situation together, said Danilo Escobar Izeli, president of Asia at JBS Seara during the sixth China International Import Expo.

;

; With a history of 70 years, the Brazilian multinational group has developed a diversified product portfolio, ranging from fresh and frozen meats to prepared meals.

;

; This year marks the company's fifth time attendance at the CIIE. Its exhibits included a variety of dishes and baked goods made with meats from its brands such as Friboi, Swift, Seara and Pilgrim's, among others.

;

; "The CIIE is a stage for foreign enterprises like ours to connect with the Chinese market and learn more about Chinese clients' needs as well as looking for new opportunities," Izeli said.

;

; He emphasized that their main objectives in the CIIE are to highlight their premium, innovative and multi-protein portfolio, and foster and strengthen relationships with Chinese partners.

;

; "JBS is keen to look for more partners in China and grow together with them," he said.

;

; During the past sessions of the CIIE, the company had signed cooperation agreements with a number of Chinese enterprises such as Haoyue Group, a beef processing plant headquartered in Northeast China's Jilin province, and Freshippo, Alibaba's supermarket chain.

;

; Since the first CIIE in 2018, JBS's business in China including bulk trade and retail of products has increased substantially, according to the company.

;

; "From officials we met to partners we work with in China, everyone is working hard to bring the business forward. Even under challenging circumstances in recent years, we managed to grow in some business units," Izeli said.

;

; Looking forward, Izeli expressed his optimism about the Chinese market.

;

; China is a very important market for JBS and will continue to be, he said, adding that they are looking to invest more in the market.

;

; "We would like to build a stable and sustainable business here in China while being a contributor to Chinese people's health and lifestyle," Izeli added.

;

; According to him, JBS is planning to expand its retail business in China.

;

; "To this end, we are reinforcing our premium, value-added brands with our value-added products from our global brands," Izeli said.

;

; This year, JBS has stepped up investment in prepared foods, with its Seara factory in the federal state of Parana in Brazil, introducing two new sausage and bread series.

;

; "We really hope to promote these new products and production lines globally including China," he said.

; Wed, 15 Nov 2023 06:52:04 +0800 001FRONT - Leaders' summit seen as crucial for worldhttps://mobile.chinadaily.com.cn/cn/html5/2023-11/15/content_001_6553e4a5ed50d203d2ca28db.htm#001FRONT
;
;;

;

;

; All eyes are on the China-United States summit as President Xi Jinping left Beijing on Tuesday for his face-to-face meeting with US President Joe Biden in San Francisco, where he will also attend the 30th Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation Economic Leaders' Meeting.

;

; Amid a complex international landscape, and at a time when China-US relations are at a critical crossroads, Xi's trip to the US has been highly anticipated.

;

; Rebecca Fatima Sta Maria, executive director of the APEC Secretariat, said that for the world's two largest economies to have a very important conversation at such a critical time opens the door to other opportunities for the world.

;

; Countries should look at more holistic benefits that can spur global growth from a broader perspective, she said.

;

; The Foreign Ministry has said that the two presidents will have in-depth communication on issues of strategic, overarching and fundamental importance in shaping China-US relations, as well as major issues concerning world peace and development.

;

; Xi will also use the APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting to fully elaborate on China's major propositions on deepening Asia-Pacific cooperation and driving regional and global growth, the ministry said.

;

; Head-of-state diplomacy plays an irreplaceable strategic role in growing China-US ties. In November last year, Xi and Biden met in Bali, Indonesia, and reached a series of important common understandings.

;

; During that meeting, Xi stressed that the development of China-US relations should be based on the three principles of mutual respect, peaceful coexistence and win-win cooperation.

;

; Despite the tempered expectations for any substantive breakthroughs in relations between Beijing and Washington, it is possible that the long-awaited Xi-Biden meeting could deliver something noteworthy, analysts said.

;

; The leaders' upcoming meeting can also help assure the world that both countries have no intention to decouple from each other and will take all possible steps to prevent the two sides from drifting into armed conflict.

;

; Wang Jisi, a professor of international relations at Peking University, said that the meeting of the two presidents in San Francisco will be of crucial significance, because it could reset the tone for the development of bilateral ties in the years to come and prepare for high-level engagements between Beijing and Washington in the next year.

;

; With the increasing number of high-level exchanges between China and the US, a series of outstanding issues will be brought up one after another, Wang said. In addition, security crises, such as the Russia-Ukraine conflict and the Palestine-Israel conflict, require joint and coordinated efforts by both countries, rather than allowing them to become factors that exacerbate strategic differences between the two countries, he said.

;

; Still, both countries have continued to lock horns on many fronts, including the Taiwan question and the South China Sea issue, both of which concern China's core interests, as well as military issues and curbs on technology and trade.

;

; Despite intensive interaction between the two countries since May, it must be recognized that China-US relations are far from out of the woods, and any mishandling of a sudden event can easily undermine the hard-won momentum of the stabilization of the ties, Wang said.

;

; In San Francisco, where leaders and representatives of the 21 APEC economies will meet on Thursday and Friday, authorities have made full preparations for the event. Workers had begun placing heavy-duty fencing along sidewalks in a security zone surrounding the Moscone Center, where the meeting will be held, on Friday.

;

; Meanwhile, San Francisco Mayor London Breed told reporters: "We want people, especially (those) who are coming here from other places, to experience San Francisco for themselves so that they can tell the story from their own experience of walking the streets and visiting other parts of our city. We want to make sure that the real story of San Francisco is told."

;

; With mounting factors of instability and uncertainty in the world economy, there is a widely shared expectation that the Asia-Pacific region will remain an economic engine to lead global growth. Therefore, the hope is high that this year's APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting will boost regional economic cooperation to create a resilient, sustainable future for all.
